objects.name: Analytic 0496
objects.description: Detects exploitation of vulnerabilities in cloud identity providers (IdPs) such as Azure AD or Okta for credential access. Defender perspective includes anomalous token creation or renewal, authentication bypass events, and API abuse to mint unauthorized tokens. Correlation highlights exploitation attempts tied to absent or inconsistent audit logs.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: azure:signinlogs
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: TokenIssued, TokenRenewed: Unexpected or anomalous token issuance events

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:unified
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: ConsentGranted: Abuse of application integrations to mint tokens bypassing MFA

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Threshold for anomalous token creation or renewal before alerting.
Applications with privileged access that should be tightly monitored for misuse.
